days.title: The Body Speaks First
days.signal:
Before anyone speaks, you notice something subtle: they shift in their seat, break eye contact,
or their breath shortens.
days.misread: Rookies rush to fill the space â€” offering reassurance, re-explaining, or trying to â€œfix it.â€
days.diagnosis:
This is a Layer 1 moment â€” the nervous system is signaling lack of safety.
Until physiological safety is restored, no logic or language can land.
interrupt: Drop all forward motion (no leaning in, no nodding, no gestures).
Do not correct, soothe, or explain.
days.safeLanguage:
â€œTake your time.â€
Then: silence.
days.practice:
Today, when you feel the urge to help, pause.
Do nothing for 10 full seconds. Let the system settle.
days.check:
Did I respond to their safety â€” or just my own discomfort?
In Sales: Youâ€™re about to jump in when a client frowns. Stop. Let the moment
breathe.

days.title: Silence Is Signal, Not Threat

Do not interpret silence as rejection.
days.safeLanguage:

days.title: Donâ€™t Accept Power Thatâ€™s Not Yours

days.title: All Hesitation Isnâ€™t Fear
